text: I have looked all through the communities and elsewhere and can find nothing on this. The desired data-id="{{loop.index}} - {{previous.loop.index}}" is baffling to me. Maybe a join statement somewhere. I also admit that JS is not my strongest suit. I probably need to change that. If I add the second "-1" to the loop.index function in the dev tools on the browser, it works.
It seems like I am so close. I don't understand why the {{loop.index}} is working correctly (data-id="innertab-1-0") in the other module and differently in this module (data-id="innertab-1").
Thank you for your help, Mark. I really appreciate it.
I'm going to continue to rack my brain until I figure this out in the meantime.
I'm also going to work with refactoring in your last message. Thank you again.

Found the answer. Whoever built the previous module I was working from added the necessary JS to the main.min.js file. I just had to copy the part of the JS into the module's JS field and change a class name. Done and done!
